body: The final section of each race's entry provides new rules options for the race beyond archetypes, detailed in the following four categories.
name: New Racial Rules
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Featured Races/New Racial Rules

sections.body: The equipment section for each race provides new rules for standard and alchemical equipment available to the race.
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Featured Races/New Racial Rules/Equipment
sections.name: Equipment

sections.body: This section provides a host of new racial feats for members of this race. All of these feats have a race listed in their prerequisites, so members of other races cannot take them.
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Featured Races/New Racial Rules/Feats
sections.name: Feats

sections.body: Magic items provided in this section are often created and used exclusively by members of the race. Some have effects that interact with racial traits, but others have broader uses, and can be used by members of other races.
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Featured Races/New Racial Rules/Magic Items
sections.name: Magic Items

sections.body: The spells in this section are common to spellcasting members of this race. Sometimes they only target members of the race, but often they are just the race's well-guarded secrets; members of other races can learn to cast them with the GM's permission.
sections.name: Spells
